How can I contribute to amplifying important tweets about Verus?

You can join the Verus Twitter Army by assigning yourself the role of 'Tweet & Share' in the #welcome channel on the Verus Discord server. This will allow you to receive notifications about high-quality tweets that need more likes and retweets, making it easy for you to contribute to amplifying important tweets about Verus.

Join Twitter Army 🐦🛎️
We need your help! The Verus community wants to amplify tweets that are important. We make it easy for you: get notified when there are high-quality tweets that need more likes and retweets.
Join the discord, assign yourself the role of ‘Tweet & Share’ (in the #welcome channel) and get retweeting!

Verus Network Halving
The Verus network block reward halving is almost around the corner. At block 2,329,920 (~Saturday 17 Dec 2022), the block reward will go from 12 to 6 VRSC.

What happens to the block reward on the Verus network during a halving event?

During a halving event on the Verus network, the block reward is reduced by half. This means that the number of VRSC rewarded to miners for solving a block is cut in half, which can have an impact on the network's overall mining economy.

How can I stay up-to-date with the latest news and updates from the Verus community?

You can subscribe to the Verus newsletter to receive a bi-monthly recap of important news and updates from the Verus community. This will keep you informed about the latest developments and events in the Verus ecosystem.
